website_summaries.verdict: Oval brush design with rubber handle for easy grip. Mix of boar bristles and nylon pins works great.
pros: Good at keeping long and thick hair untangled
Works on both wet and dry hair
Good build quality considering the low price
Looks nice and is easy to clean
cons: Smaller ratio of boar bristles to nylon pins than other brushes

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this hairbrush. Does everything it says it can do.
customer_reviews.text: I never realized there was a type of hairbrush for my problem hair. So, I was quite excited finding out there was and it worked. First of the brush is very soft, it has a black bristles on the bottom that are short. Then, a longer one with a plastic ball on the end for a massaging action. First trying it I could feel and see the results instantly. I brushed all the way through my dry, thick, frizzy, wavy hair with ease. Very comfortable on my scalp. The results say it all. The brush itself is very comfortable in my medium sized hand. Also, it is a very pretty golden bronze color.
customer_reviews.author: B Waitt

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine, long hair
customer_reviews.text: I have long, fine hair and I am careful with how I treat it because it is easily damaged. I would recommend this hairbrush 100%. Its great quality, feels comfortable while using it and the price is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I have short hair and the brush wasn’t as good as suspected
customer_reviews.text: Bristles were not as strong as I would have suspected. I have short hair and the brush wasn’t as good as suspected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great. Definitely a good find for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Mroczkowski

customer_reviews.title: It brushes like any other brush
customer_reviews.text: It brushes like any other brush, but the description is misleading. Barely any boar bristles in the brush. Majority is nylon. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for medium length hair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for medium length hair, no need for extra pressure, untangles hair, could be made a little more sturdy and some of the bristles are bend and not straight, but overall a good product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Amlani

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this brush
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this brush...at first. Then the plastic bristles started to fall out. First just a few and after a couple months a lot. She can't even use it now. Not worth it people!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Bellmont

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this brush. I've had it almost a year now. (I wash my hair every 3 to 4 days).It is just is a very nice, strong, brush, and firm but soft.
customer_reviews.author: D. SCH

customer_reviews.title: it’s like night and day
customer_reviews.text: Very average brush, spend a few extra dollars and get a Denman one, you’ll thank me later. That’s what I did after my wife told me that’s what she used, it’s like night and day! From a man with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There was someone else's hair on the brush when I got it, this is gross...how do I return this!
customer_reviews.author: alexander tri nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This hair brush was awesome when I first received it
customer_reviews.text: This hair brush was awesome when I first received it. I was able to brush this birds nest of crazy tangles and knots even when it was wet when I first received this brush. My 6 year old loved this brush as well seems it hardly pulled her hair when she used it. After using it for a few months the bristles are falling out and the longer bristles get pushed in making it almost worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Riddle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Threw away. Pulled my hair out. Sorry to say the brush wasn't right for me. Don't want a new one. Sorry!! My hair is very thin. Just trying not to bald or wear wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Construction quality not very good
customer_reviews.text: Concept is very good. However construction quality leaves a lot to be desired. The new brush had a number of bristles twisted, couple missing and many of different sizes. Not worth returning. So will use a bit and then throw it
customer_reviews.author: JP2012

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, easy to clean, and it works out my tangles fast!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different brushes that claim they can fight tangles well, but those brushes pick up lint and flakes etc (because long tangly hair picks up/holds onto everything) and I struggle with cleaning the bristles because of odd shapes, etc and end up having to throw the brushes away since they eventually look too filthy. But this brush is perfect, I can pull everything off of it and it goes back to looking brand new!
customer_reviews.author: The Amazing Robyn Dobyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Wet Brush and my Tangle Teaser, but I love this brush because it feels a bit more gentle. It’s great for brushing out too tight curls, plus brushing my hair when I have my clip in extensions applied. Overall, I had been needing a new brush (one with bristles) for quite a long time and this is a great value. It does a good job, plus it isn’t falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Really nice brush.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the brushes I've used this one is the best! I have thick hair that a boar bristle won't brush through. And I have a brush with wooden pegs. It's really nice too. But I feel this making it through my hair and the longer bristles reach to the scalp. I've never had a snag, or has it jus slid over the hair. Feels good in my hand too.
customer_reviews.author: P Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Nylon Bristles Fall Out
customer_reviews.text: The nylon bristles started to fall out and/or easily bend as soon as my daughter used it. I ordered this because it had the combination of bristles. I would not purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hough

customer_reviews.title: Not Long Lasting Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the brush was good quality but could use more Bore hare. However, the little white tips of the brush are almost all gone. It took about 2 months when I started seeing the round tips disappear. Brush is almost unusable and mostly worthless.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This brush is okay. It gets tangles out better than plastic bristles but the boar bristles fall out easily and when it arrived, the nylon bristles were bent our of shape. If I were to order a boar bristle brush again, I wouldn't order this brush.
customer_reviews.author: The Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK brush.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not so sure what's so special about this brush. It's not great with wet hair. It doesn't make my hair look any different than an normal brush. It's just alright.
customer_reviews.author: heng

customer_reviews.title: Tops of brush cane off
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for almost a year and all the tops of the brush have come off. Now it hurts and I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brush! Love the style and the looks of ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful brush! Love the style and the looks of it. Easy to hold when brushing. Wonderful. Would recommend friends !
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Loved this brush so much that I bought one for my barberette/stylist for a birthday present! It makes my hair much more manageable and softer...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Brush is just like described. No issues after several months of use. More gentle on my toddler’s hair than a regular brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B.

customer_reviews.title: This soft bristle brush is my favorite. Been looking for a hairbrush before
customer_reviews.text: This soft bristle brush is my favorite. Been looking for a hairbrush before, but can't find a better one for my hair. This is soft and perfect for everyday use. I don't regret buying this item. Very affordable as well it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY love this brush! It's so good. The handle is amazing it's not week or cheap feeling it works wonderfully! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works great on thick wavy hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush, it works great! I ordered a second brush for my daughter to take home because she has thick wavy hair and it does not pull or break hair and easily gets out tangles...
customer_reviews.author: Rutski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hair brush I ever had, It is easy on the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received with half of the bristles sunken into the pad. As if something was sitting on it, and smushed then down. Tried pulling them to the surface, but they will not stay out, and sink back in. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: michigangal

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really care for this brush nor did my daughter. It really pulled on our hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Received a used brush with hairs in it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brush with hopes of receiving a good product. The brush I received was disgusting with hairs in it! and with bristles bent! Very disappointed to have received a used brush. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Craftyart

customer_reviews.title: First time buying a boar bristle brush. No Regrets!
customer_reviews.text: This boar bristle brush is amazing! Since I bought it, I have been using it much more than a comb. It makes hair softer and smoother since it distributes the hair sebaceous oils all around the hair, leaving the scalp to balance its production. I can truly say I am an avid fan of boar bristle brushes and recommend anyone to purchase one, especially this one. Affordable, reusable, and healthy for your hair, what more can you ask!?
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Makes your hair very smooth and flat. If that is not what you want to happen I would not buy this brush. It also is very good at taking all the dead hair out- again if that is not what you want skip this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: karmaisa....

customer_reviews.title: All Smiles
customer_reviews.text: This brush is absolutely amazing! My young daughter often hates to brush her hair especially if it is wet. After trying many style brushes without it causing some tears this one even made her smile. It works for me too. As I am getting older my hair seems more dry and breaks easily. This brush helps eliminate the breakage.
customer_reviews.author: petella

customer_reviews.title: Boar bristles are 1/2 the length of plastic bristles
customer_reviews.text: The natural bristles are only half the length as the plastic bristles, so they don't get close to your scalp when you brush your hair. I don't understand how boar bristles are expected to help spread natural hair oils with this design. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush. i brush my hair holding the bristle end, as it gives me more control, and my long man-flow looks and feels great- lots of compliments. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, best brush that my wife has ever used.
customer_reviews.author: billb

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice brush. Easy to hold and very comfortable when touched. highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Han Steven Z

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a round or oval version and it did not fit my scalp as I had hoped, Company offered to send me the square version as a replacement. The brush is of good quality but make sure you know which style suits the sensitivity of your scalp as you would with any brush.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Plastic Smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell does not go away for a month. The percentage of boar bristle is less than the nylon bristles. Not impressive. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wilson

product_meta.title: Yolika Boar Bristle Paddle Detangling Brush for Men and Women, Designed for Wet, Dry, Thick, Thin, Curly and Straight Hair Comb, Gold
product_meta.description:
Yolika Simplify Your Life

Brush's quality can directly affect the health of hair:

Choosing a good one can make your hair soft and shiny; choosing a bad one can make your hair dry and rough.

※ An ordinary brush is too sharp, would damage hair and scalp for long-term use, even causing inflammation. Yolika Boar Bristle Hair Brush can massage scalp, increase circulation and promote hair growth.

※ An ordinary brush which made of nylon, hard plastic or metal, can easy to produce electrostatic when it rubs hair.It can dry and damage hair. Yolika Boar Bristle Hair Brush can anti static, use the oil produced by the scalp to lubricate hair, and make your hair soft and shiny.

※ An ordinary brush has sparse comb, it can not clean the hair. Yolika Boar Bristle Hair Brush has bushy bristles with rubs, it can clean dandruff, pollutant and extra hair care products.

Tips on Maintenance:

※Avoid long periods of direct sunlight, lest cause products aging

※Do not rub against hard or rough objects to avoid scratches, affecting beauty

※ Boar bristle hair brush is just like human hair, can wash with shampoo and rinse it, the brush become cleaner.

Would you like to make your hair healthier? Please don't hesitate to add to shopping cart!
feature_bullets: Oil produced by the scalp is the best natural conditioner, superior boar bristle can bring natural oil from the root to the tip
Avoid hair pulling and tangle: Yolika have unique comb which is the combination of boar bristle and soft nylon, can brush your hair much easier
Widely-used: No matter your hair is wet or dry, thick or thin, straight or curly, the brush can perform perfectly
The upper ends of the brush teeth are made into circles that can prevent scalp injury, the striped anti-slip handle has an ergonomic design
